author: Reuters Editorial
title: Transgene Q1 Operating Revenue Stable At 1.8 Million Euros
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Transgene SA:
* TRANSGENE: â‚¬35.6 MILLION IN CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AS OF MARCH 31, 2018
* CLINICAL TRIALS NOW ON-GOING WITH 5 IMMUNO-THERAPEUTICS
* CLINICAL READOUTS EXPECTED FOR EACH OF OUR 5 PRODUCTS IN 2018
* Q1 OPERATING REVENUE EUR 1.8 MILLION VERSUS EUR 1.9 MILLION YEAR AGO
* TRANSGENE EXPECTS ITS CASH BURN FOR 2018 TO BE COMPARABLE TO 2017
* TRANSGENE CONFIRMS THAT IT EXPECTS READOUTS IN 2018 FOR EACH OF ITS 5 PRODUCTS IN CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
